title: LR-65
author: Let Us All Rejoice
snippet: When he calls on me, I will answer him; I will deliver him and give him glory, I will grant him length of days.

title: Psalm 51: 3-4, 5-6ab, 12-13, 14 and 17
author: Francesca LaRosa
snippet: Be merciful, O Lord, for we have sinned.

title: Matthew 4:4b
author: Tom Booth
snippet: One does not live on bread alone, but on every word that comes forth from the mouth of God.

title: Be Not Afraid/No Temas Más
author: Bob Dufford SJ
snippet: You shall cross the barren desert, but you shall not die of thirst. You shall wander far in safety though you do not know the way. You shall speak your words in foreign lands and all will understand. You shall see the face of God and live.

title: LR-67
author: Let Us All Rejoice
snippet: The Lord will conceal you with his pinions, And under his wings you will trust.

title: Hosea
author: Weston Priory/Gregory Norbet
snippet: Come back to me with all your heart. Don’t let fear keep us apart. Trees do bend, though straight and tall; so must we to others’ call.

title: On Eagle’s Wings
author: Michael Joncas
snippet: You who dwell in the shelter of the Lord, who abide in his shadow for life, say to the Lord: "My refuge, my rock in whom I trust!"

title: Revive Us, O God
author: Jesse Manibusan
snippet: Revive us, O God, breathe into us the way of your wisdom, the depth of your trust. You are our hope, you are our light, O God.

author: Mass of St. Mary Magdalene - Sarah Hart
snippet: Lord, have mercy. Christ have mercy. Lord have mercy

author: Mass of St. Mary Magdalene - Sarah Hart
snippet: Glory to God! Glory to God in the highest, and on earth, peace to people of goodwill.

author: Mass of St. Mary Magdalene - Sarah Hart
snippet: Holy, holy, holy Lord God of hosts. Heaven and earth are full of your glory. Hosanna in the highest. Blessed is he who comes in the moment of the Lord. Hosanna in the highest.

author: Mass of St. Mary Magdalene - Sarah Hart
snippet: When we eat this bread and drink this cup, we proclaim your death, O Lord, until you come again.

author: Mass of St. Mary Magdalene - Sarah Hart
Mass of St. Mary Magdalene - Sarah Hart
snippet: Lamb of God, You take away the sins of the world; have mercy, have mercy on us.
